results.name: Zero-one version of Golay-Rudin-Shapiro sequence (or word).
comment: This is (1-A020985(n))/2. See A020985, which is the main entry for this sequence, for more information. _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 06 2012
A word that is uniform primitive morphic, but not pure morphic. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 14 2018
